error.message: Parameter $query_factory of method Drupal\filebrowser\FilebrowserUninstallValidator::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_delete_recursive(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::deleteRecursive().
Call to deprecated function tablesort_init(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Utility\TableSort::getContextFromRequest() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_scan_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::scanDirectory() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to filebrowser.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
